content.description: As an AI Tutor at Toloka.ai, I play a crucial role in training Large Language Models by creating organic and fluid dialogues between humans and artificial intelligence tools. My focus is on the domains of literature, linguistics, and other humanities topics. In this position, I develop accessible humanities content for diverse learners, craft domain-specific AI prompts for a range of learning scenarios, and ensure AI accuracy and alignment with current research and methodologies. This role demonstrates my expertise in AI training, content creation, and maintaining the integrity of information in the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence.
